evidence.text: submit this Complaint seeking declaratory and injunctive relief against Defendant Richard D. Holcomb, in his official capacity as Commissioner of the Virginia Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV), to address and remedy the systemic, pervasive, and ongoing failure of the Commonwealth to provide basic protections afforded by the Due Process and Equal Protection Clauses of the United States Constitution before taking the harsh enforcement measure of suspending driver’s licenses against indigent people whose poverty prevents them from paying debts owed to courts.

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Seek declaratory and injunctive relief against Defendant Richard D. Holcomb to address and remedy the systemic, pervasive, and ongoing failure of the Commonwealth to provide basic protections afforded by the Due Process and Equal Protection Clauses of the United States Constitution before taking the harsh enforcement measure of suspending driver’s licenses against indigent people whose poverty prevents them from paying debts owed to courts.

evidence.text: The Plaintiffs seek relief from the Commonwealth’s unconstitutional scheme that unfairly punishes them for being poor.

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Seek relief from the Commonwealth’s unconstitutional scheme that unfairly punishes them for being poor.

evidence.text: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin the Defendant, his subordinates, agents, employees, representatives, and all others acting or purporting to act in concert with him or on his behalf from issuing or processing orders of driver’s license suspension for unpaid court debt against the Plaintiffs and Class Members

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin the Defendant, his subordinates, agents, employees, representatives, and all others acting or purporting to act in concert with him or on his behalf from issuing or processing orders of driver’s license suspension for unpaid court debt against the Plaintiffs and Class Members.

evidence.text: Preliminarily and permanently issue an injunction ordering the Defendant to reinstate the Plaintiffs’ and Class Members’ driver’s licenses and enjoining the Defendant from requiring the Plaintiffs and Class Members to pay the DMV reinstatement fees as a condition of such reinstatement

evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek declaratory relief, as well as injunctive relief prohibiting Defendant from suspending driver’s licenses due to nonpayment of fines and fees until Virginia can do so in a constitutional manner.
